title: Ah...we humans
creator_contributor_role: Institut für Film und Bild, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Cross-cultural studies
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Race discrimination
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Culture conflict
description: A non-narrated, animated cartoon with humorous sound effects, giving an understanding of how people react when confronted with behaviour patterns different from their own. Deals with a number of concepts related to groups and conflict: cultural awareness, beliefs and ignorance, scarce resources and the value of alliances. No other credits available.
